page.title: 02A TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY
page.content: On a school day most of us have the same routine.When we wake up,we get up ,get washed and dressed and have breakfast.Some of us have bacon and eggs or cereal and toast for breakfast. School begins at 9.25am and we all have different ways of getting to school. Some of us travel by bus or car;some of us cycle and some of us live close enough to walk to school. During our time in school we do maths,writing,crafts,reading, games,P.E.,singing and have stories.We have one hour for lunch as none of us lives close enough to go home in the hour. School ends at 3.25pm,when we go home for tea.Some of our dads finish work and come home by about 6pm.We play outdoors or watch television.By 8pm most of us are in bed.
